title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 700.12 - Change of address
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 700.12 - Change of address

State Regulations
(a) Appellant. An appellant must keep the board advised at all times of any change
of address. Failure to do so can lead to dismissal of the appeal on the basis
of abandonment. (b) Respondent. A
respondent must notify the board of any change of address. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
700.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
